Ice-albedo feedback and Snowball Earth in the EBM
Unlike most of the other notebooks in this series, this one performs some intensive computations and may take more than an hour to run from start to finish (your mileage may vary).

%matplotlib inline
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from climlab import constants as const
import climlab

Source: Walker, J. and Geissman, J. (2009). Geologic time scale. Technical report, Geological Society of America.

children.label: 3. Annual-mean EBM with albedo feedback: adjustment to equilibrium

children.value: Here we will use the 1-dimensional diffusive Energy Balance Model (
) to explore the effects of albedo feedback and heat transport on climate sensitivity.

print(model1)
